homePage.subtitle: I'm Monica
homePage.description: I'm a Brazilian web developer, passionate about the client side and developing beautiful websites. Right now I'm dedicated to learning more about frontend development, especially the technologies around React. During my free time I enjoy playing video games and watching anime. I also have a psychology degree!

result.0: Thank you for reaching out to me!

project0.description: A website created to consume data from an third-party API and display it on screen. The home page is served statically, while the detail pages are rendered on the server!

project1.description: A full stack application to rank the animes you've watched! Axios was used to fetch the user's data from our database and also to fetch animes from a third-party api, that serves the anime guide.

project2.description: A classroom environment! The app was built with React and GraphQL to consume the GraphCMS API and display the lessons dynamically. This was developed throughout the IgniteLab, from RocketSeat.

project3.description: A vanilla JavaScript SPA that was developed to document my progress as a Web Developer, throughout my studies on Rocketseat's program 'Explorer'. I used Linktree's concept as my inspiration to build this website.

project4.description: Developed to group your favorite GitHub profiles! The app consumes the GitHub API, so the user may access the provided public information about the searched username.

project5.description: A landing page for the Instagram project @psi.indica, in which the user can choose the type of content that they want to consume, so cards may be displayed correspondingly, including a random option.

notFound: How did you get here? Would you like some music?
